content:
Hi all, I've just completed my weekend project, a crate for creating types that are required to be pinned from the start. pin-init (docs, repository). This design allows safe initialization and use of pthread mutex without any boxing: https://github.com/nbdd0121/pin-init/blob/trunk/examples/pthread_mutex.rs. It could even be safely created on the stack!

Any thoughts and suggestions (soundness, ergonomics, whatever) welcome!
